description: Lyle is first introduced as Lockon`s unnamed twin brother early on in season one, where he is shown carrying a bouquet of flowers to place on his family`s grave as his brother watches him from behind a tree. He does not make another appearance for the remainder of the season; however, he is mentioned by name in Lockon`s dying soliloquy, in which Neil remarks that the world of tomorrow would be the world in which Lyle would live in.
name: Lockon Stratos
